column1: '''Anke Katrin Eißmann''' (born [[1977]]) is a German artist. She was introduced to the world of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] in [[1991]], and has created many pieces of art inspired by his books. Eißmann's work had been popular on the Internet for some time when she was asked to attend [[Tolkien 2005]], filling an artists' panel with [[Alan Lee]] and [[Ted Nasmith]]. That same year, her art was used in ''[[Ringers: Lord of the Fans]]''.
